title: File Handling
mission_log: Hidden logs are stored in files. Read them to find the next clue.
challenge: Read a file clue.txt and print its contents.
starter_code:
# Read the file
with open("clue.txt", "r") as file:
    contents = 
    print()
solution:
with open("clue.txt", "r") as file:
    contents = file.read()
    print(contents)

checker.note: Game will create clue.txt with 'SECRET_MESSAGE: The key is Python!' before testing

hints: file.read() reads everything from the file and returns it as text
Then print it: print(contents) - make sure both lines are indented under 'with'
